title: Furnished 2 bedroom apartment 66m2 with central heating + 2 balconies
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Furnished 2 bedroom apartment for rent in the 13th arrondissement very close to the 5th arrondissement.
Total space 66m2.
Spacious living room
2 separate bedrooms (roommates are welcome).
2 BALCONIES !
Lots of cupboards.
Fully equipped eat-in kitchen including all electric appliances. 
Bathroom with a shower and separate WC.
Washing machine.
Dish washer.
Large windows.
Lots of light.
Safe building, well maintained.
2nd floor with an elevator.
Private car parking and storage. 
2100 euros per month including building charges, water and CENTRAL HEATING.

Real-estate agency fee to be paid on top of the rent (one time fee).

To schedule a visit, please contact us via WhatsApp on +33663087837 or send us an email.
